name: Super QZ0; Fighters
description:
Winner of TK Game Jam 2019! 

Walk on a keyboard, both in the game and real life (we suggest using fingers, not legs) and try to stab second player!

Controls:
Blue (Left) Player:
Left leg: QWERTYUIOP
Right leg: ZXCVBNM,./

Red (Right) Player:
Left leg: ;LKJHGFDSA
Right leg: 0987654321


2nd floor, room

Bartosz Jakubczyński - Gamedesign

Sebastian Kowalik - 3D modelling

Maciej Sozański - Proagrammer
